category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AW_search_suggestion_handler
preference.preference_description: Specifies the request handler for displaying suggestions during a search in Active Workspace. Valid values are: * SpellCheck : Displays single word suggestions. This is the default value. * Phrase : Displays phrased suggestions. * NoSuggestions : Do not return any suggestion.
